mapper.sql: permission.CODE as code,permission.CREATE_TIME as createTime,permission.CREATOR_ID as creatorId,permission.ICON as icon,permission.ID as id,permission.NAME as name,permission.PID as pid,permission.RANK as rank,permission.STATE as state,permission.TYPE as type,permission.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime,permission.URL as url
mapper.update:
update SYS_PERMISSION
CODE = #{ code },
CREATE_TIME = #{ createTime },
CREATOR_ID = #{ creatorId },
ICON = #{ icon },
ID = #{ id },
NAME = #{ name },
PID = #{ pid },
RANK = #{ rank },
STATE = #{ state },
TYPE = #{ type },
UPDATE_TIME = #{ updateTime },
URL = #{ url },
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_PERMISSION permission
and instr(permission.CODE,#{ t.code })>0
order by permission.${sort} ${sortOrder}
order by permission.CREATE_TIME DESC
